resources.string: Studying to become a mobile application developer remotely.

Committed and results-driven professional with a diverse background in application development. I excel in problem solving, communication, teamwork, and I am committed to delivering high quality results, innovation and efficiency. I am a proactive learner who constantly seeks opportunities to expand my knowledge and stay up to date with industry trends. I am excited to bring my expertise and enthusiasm to a forward-thinking team. Trained web developer. Previously worked with C#, JS, MySQL, HTML, CSS.
